qas.question: How many times per year do female dogs go into heat?
What does going into heat (estrous) prepare a female dog for?
Some larger breeds could take how long to become sexually mature?
What does a female dog experience at sexual maturity?

context: In domestic dogs, sexual maturity begins to happen around age six to twelve months for both males and females, although this can be delayed until up to <a0_0><a2_0>two<a0_0/> years<a2_0/> old for some large breeds. This is the time at which female dogs will have their <a3_0>first estrous cycle<a3_0/>. They will experience subsequent estrous cycles biannually, during which the body prepares for <a1_0>pregnancy.<a1_0/> At the peak of the cycle, females will come into estrus, being mentally and physically receptive to copulation. Because the ova survive and are capable of being fertilized for a week after ovulation, it is possible for a female to mate with more than one male.
